subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Quarterback Zach Mettenberger injured his left knee while unloading a 32-yard completion in the fourth quarter of No. 14 L.S.U.’s 31-27 victory over Arkansas on Friday.
snippet: Quarterback Zach Mettenberger injured his left knee while unloading a 32-yard completion in the fourth quarter of No. 14 L.S.U.’s 31-27 victory over Arkansas on Friday.
